about_me.content: Hola Folk's, My name is Akshay Jain & I am in Fourth year of my B.Tech Degree Course. I am an Enthusiastic Frontend Developer not too proficient but try to improve my skills in every instance of my life & Always keen to learn more. I don't wanna be master or so called awesome coder, I just wanna code for fun or to amuse myself. I feel kind of relaxed when i am coding.  Apart from Coding I spend rest of my time in sleeping & I am kind of lazy human always yawning. My Companion sometimes call me Torpid.
about_me.title: About Me
